mapper.select: with recursive fn_recipe_comment as ( select recipe_no as recipeNo, comment_no as commentNo, comment_parent_no as commentParentNo, comment_content as commentContent, comment_writer as commentWriter, comment_createdate as commentCreateDate, comment_moddate as commentModDate, comment_status as commentStatus, 1 as commentLevel from recipe_comment where comment_parent_no is null and recipe_no = #{value} union all select recipe_no as recipeNo, comment_no as commentNo, comment_parent_no as commentParentNo, comment_content as commentContent, comment_writer as commentWriter, comment_createdate as commentCreateDate, comment_moddate as commentModDate, comment_status as commentStatus, C.commentLevel + 1 as commentLevel from recipe_comment B inner join fn_recipe_comment C on B.comment_parent_no = C.commentNo ) select * from fn_recipe_comment

select recipe_no as recipeNo, comment_no as commentNo, comment_parent_no as commentParentNo, comment_content as commentContent, comment_writer as commentWriter, comment_createdate as commentCreateDate, comment_moddate as commentModDate, comment_status as commentStatus from recipe_comment where comment_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into recipe_comment (recipe_no, comment_content, comment_writer, comment_parent_no) values (#{recipeNo}, #{commentContent}, #{commentWriter}, #{commentParentNo})
mapper.update: update recipe_comment set comment_content = #{commentContent}, comment_writer = #{commentWriter}, comment_moddate = now(), comment_status = 'N' where comment_no = #{commentNo}
update recipe_comment set comment_content = #{commentContent}, comment_moddate = now() where comment_no = #{commentNo}
